message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can't negotiate with me, I'm the one with the upper hand!
I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but not that much more. Let's meet in the middle!
You're getting desperate, I can see. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting away with too much!
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of. Let's find a compromise that works for both of us.
You're getting closer, but I'm not there yet. I'll give you a bit more, but don't think you're getting off that easily!
I'm not going to give up yet. I think we can find a better compromise. Let's try to meet in the middle again.
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm not budging. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
I'm not giving up yet. I'll make one more attempt to find a compromise. Let's try to find a middle ground.
You're running out of time, Alice. I'm not going to make any more concessions. Take it or leave it, this is my final offer!
I'm not giving up yet. I'll make one more attempt to find a compromise. Let's try to find a middle ground.
This is my last offer, Alice. Take it or leave it. I'm not going to make any more concessions. The game is over.
